channel.title: Matrix.Corp News
channel.description: Matrix.Corp official news source. All announcements will be published here.

item.title: Digital ID Cards Commencing Distribution on 21/10/2025
item.description: Official Matrix.Corp Digital Identity Cards will be made available for download starting October 21st, 2025.
item.content:encoded: Matrix.Corp Digital Identity Cards will be made available for download starting October 21st, 2025. These verifiable credentials are tied directly to your user profile and provide cryptographic proof of your clearance within the corporate hierarchy.

item.title: Welcome to the Authoritative Matrix.Corp News Feed
item.description: This feed serves as the single, authoritative source for all critical Matrix.Corp announcements.
item.content:encoded:
This feed serves as the single, authoritative source for all critical Matrix.Corp announcements, utilizing the RSS standard for maximum syndication and accessibility across diverse client applications.

Please integrate this endpoint URL into your preferred feed reader to guarantee immediate ingestion of all future high-priority corporate and system notifications.
